participant_1.background:
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
i like my job.
My morning routine starts with taking my allergy medication so that I can tolerate being around my neighbors' cats.
I started spending more time with my family and focusing on my own hobbies.

participant_2.background:
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
My parents have always been there for me and supported my dreams.
i like chicken nuggets.
i go to at least 10 concerts a year.
My parents were always supportive of my wild ways.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm selling cosmetics in my spare time and it's going really well.
That's awesome! I'm looking for a new place to live that's close to my favorite fishing spot.
Oh cool, where are you looking to move?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm thinking somewhere in the Midwest.
That's a great place to live! I've always wanted to go fishing in the Midwest.
You should come visit! I'll take you fishing.
That would be great! Thanks for the invite.
No problem! I'm always happy to make new friends.
Me too! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts, I go to at least 10 a year.
That's awesome! I love concerts too. Who are some of your favorite bands?
I love all kinds of music, but my favorite bands are The Beatles, The Rolling Stones, and Queen.
Those are all great bands! I love The Beatles too.
Me too! They're my favorite band of all time.
I have to go now, but it was great chatting with you!
You too! Have a great day!
